scenario_text.value: G-Gabumon...!

I used too much of my strength, and turned
back into this...
I wonder... Do you like this look better?

Who cares! You’re still you, no matter what
form you take!
Yeah! Thanks, Akiharu!

(...Their bond really has returned. No, it’s
even stronger than before.)

To think...you could defeat Qinglongmon.
In that case, you may be able to stop him.
“Him”? Who do you mean?

I believe it may be one of the boys offered
up as a sacrifice, is it not?

To explain, I must speak of things long since
past...

Gods and the being known as the Master did
not originally exist in this world.

Those who lived in our original world
respected, feared and honored this one.
This world was merely molded by these souls.

That’s why a consciousness tainted by dark
emotions could bring calamity...
Our feelings had an influence...

Indeed. Human feelings are the foundation
of this world.

We were born in an era of war. I was offered
as a sacrifice along with four others.

Life was cheap in this period... So this
world was also plunged into chaos.
That’s why we made a vow.

We united the world, and became god beasts.
We would use that power of the spirits...
To create a new world. One devoid of hatred.
But the result...is what you see before you.

Was this his fault? The existence we know as
the Master...

Yes. The one now called the Master...could
not abandon hatred.

You see, the one who offered him was the 
maiden he idolized deep in his heart...

His own sister. The feeling of being betrayed
was much stronger than the others.

The rest of us tried to stop him.
But with our power alone...

It took all we had to suppress his power,
and just barely.
That is why we must entrust you with a task.
The boy is simply drowning in his anger.

If you can bring him to his senses, this
entire world will be saved!

(The Master—Haruchika. The mastermind behind
all of this. Is he also a casualty of power?)

(I can’t forgive him for throwing this world
into chaos, and abducting Miyuki...)

(I can’t say I’ll save him for sure. Who
knows if our power will work on the Master.)

(Still... If someone’s in trouble, and only
we can handle it, there’s only one answer.)
(How should I respond?)
We’ll save him!
We’ll save our friend.
We’ll do what we can.
We’ll save him!
We’ll save Haruchika, no matter what!

If that’s our mission, we’ll see it through
to the end!
We’ll save our friend.

We’re here to save our friend Miyuki, nothing
more.
Takuma...

Still, if that saves Haruchika too, then we
can give it a try.
We’ll do what we can.

Can’t say we’ll save him for sure. We don’t
even know if we can stop the Master.

So this is all I can say: We’ll do what we
can.

And if we can save him...then we’ll save him
for sure!
Heh. A splendid answer, indeed.
So please, help him—help Haruchika.

To think the child who controls the god
beasts would ask this of us...
Haruchika...

The guy said it before, right? He’s the
Master’s true identity, and their friend.

Correct. Haruchika somehow interfered with
the system that maintains this world...

And thus, became the being now known as the
Master.

But even Haruchika has friends who worry
about him...

Indeed. And so our path is clear, Takuma my
boy.

Yeah! Let’s do it...let’s save Haruchika with
our own strength!
Please, help that poor boy.
